org.mitre.provenance.client

Class RESTProvenanceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.provenance.client.AbstractProvenanceClient
      • org.mitre.provenance.client.RESTProvenanceClient

  • public class RESTProvenanceClient
extends AbstractProvenanceClient
    This class acts as a client for a remote provenance server which can serve up provenance or permit reporting of new provenance via RESTful services.
    Author:
    DMALLEN

        public RESTProvenanceClient(String host)
                     throws ProvenanceClientException
        Throws:
        ProvenanceClientException

      • RESTProvenanceClient

        public RESTProvenanceClient(String host,
                            String port)
                     throws ProvenanceClientException
        Create a client object to send requests to a provenance service located at a particular location.
        Parameters:
        host - the host where the provenance service can be found.
        port - the port the provenance service is running on.
        Throws:
        when - parameters are invalid
        ProvenanceClientException

      • report

        public boolean report(ProvenanceCollection col)
               throws ProvenanceClientException
        Report a provenance collection to a remote service. This has the effect of writing the given provenance collection to the remote service's store.
        Specified by:
        report in class AbstractProvenanceClient
        Parameters:
        col - the collection to report
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if not successful.
        Throws:
        ProvenanceClientException
